name: fnf remake 2.0
description:
This game took me lilerly 1 month and plus to create it.  

warning:if you want to play the game whit no lag you must have a device from at least 2018 whit higth performance.

sorry guys for the logo of the game i Tried to change it but i coudn't.

    the remake have :

-the tutorial week.

-hit box  and buttons and if you Turn on or off  the hit box make sure to go see the video.

-screen resizor which you can use in options to resize your screen.

-5 character test and its a demo(make sure to folow me becose am gonna release a 15 character test app).
